title: UniJoin
author: UniJoin
created_time: September 12, 2023, 06:29:31 PMLast edit: September 26, 2023, 01:07:30 AM by UniJoin
content: We are glad to announce that this series of raffles will be dedicated to UniJoin collectible cards created in cooperation with Icarus. üîêThere are only 20 cards released and it will be impossible to buy them, but you can take part in one of the 19 raffles and try to win one of them. ¬†After one of the users wins a custom UniJoin card and confirms that he received it, it will be loaded onto 1mBTC. We wish everyone good luck!Summary:- Pick a slot.- We reserve the right to ignore any participant for any reason.- Once a block is chosen, the last digits of the hash will determine the winner.00 - Thiago00701 - Little Mouse02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - Out of mind04 - haloxon05 - 5tift06 - Steeley07 - krogoth08 - Buchi-8809 - Dickiy10 - julerz1211 - Suzuki Matt12 - mx12art13 - geophphreigh14 - ChiBitCTy15 - PeakDK16 - AMAX17 - Humble Bitcoiners18 - Hotdog719 - bct_ail20 - Danydee21 - MoparMiningLLC22 - tread9323 - slapper24 - stackitup25 - hopenotlate26 - Disruptivas27 - tldr-hodl 28 - iwantmyhomepaidwithbtc229 - cls6330 - mv198631 - HelliumZ32 - Ryu_Ar133 - klarki34 - Eclipse3335 - sheenshane36 - Box Guy37 - TopTort77738 - joker_josue39 - Timelord206740 - khiholangkang41 - $crypto$42 - tweetious43 - poptok144 - Bitcoin_people45 - yahoo6227846 - TryNinja47 - YodasRedRocket48 - Koal-8449 - Dernoste50 - aoluain51 - inthelongrun52 - TxCryptoKid53 - BTCOVERFIATS54 - MrsMopar55 - LDL56 - tg8857 - Asuspawer0958 - The_Crypto_Kid59 - bestcoin_5960 - GxSTxV61 - Mortare62 - red4slash63 - bangjoe64 - ajiz13865 - Lakai0166 - Real-Duke67 - 2stout68 - NeuroticFish69 - Inagame70 - Markzellers71 - owlcatz72 - Mbitr73 - ovcijisir74 - salad daging75 - minerjones76 - Ratimov77 - Xprim77778 - Caribbean Treasures79 - Crytocanuk80 - Learn Bitcoin81 - AHOYBRAUSE82 - CoinageMint83 - red4slash84 - sunnybwoy85 - Kryptowerk86 - examplens87 - JanEmil88 - bitbollo89 - Doblezero90 - Frank AlpenCoin91 - Remsjack92 - xLays93 - buckrogers94 - bullrun2020bro95 - ithd196 - pawel7797 - Abiky98 - shasan99 - willi9974Prize information- Free shipping! (Europe).Quote from: cygan on September 01, 2023, 04:03:35 PMUniJoin cards - on the front side the following is printed: serial (bottom left), BTC address (bottom center), qr-code of the respective BTC address and the block time of the production (bottom right). additionally the serial is embossed a second time above the UniJoin slogan. On the backside you can find the hologram (thanks to polymerbit) which protects the private key in the form of a qr-code printed on the card (which is additionally secured with a piece of paper). in addition, both sides have been professionally laminated and have a top qualityCode:#S/N: UNIJOIN.3 : bc1qgqtajsnjxzdscd4wfyzpj83fqt4kyre020ghvu
